doc.title: Link's Shorts
doc.plot: Genial, square-jawed newsreader Link Anchorman introduces pseudo-amateur animation comedies, "too weird, too strange and too short to ever be shown". The themes are bizarre (eg old ladies, turned off by modern TV, walk off a pier, like lemmings), the animation styles diverse, and Link's explanations of their origins nearly credible. Each episode is effectively a visual one-line joke.
